repnme.cdata!:
Jordan - Eight Cities Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Eight Cities Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project will improve water supply service and
            provide new sewerage service in the cities of Ramtha,
            Mafraq, Anjara, Ajloun, Ein Janneh, Kufrinja, Madaba and
            Ma'an. It will include: (i) construction of about 110
            km of trunk and distribution water mains, 8000
